name: @hv/uikit-react-icons
description: A collection of icons for use with Hitachi Vantara's React Components.

scripts.build: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --serial clean:all svg-optimize build:*
scripts.build:babel:node: BABEL_ENV=commonjs npx babel --root-mode upward bin -d dist --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.build:babel:legacy: BABEL_ENV=legacy npx babel --root-mode upward bin -d dist/legacy --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.build:babel:modern: BABEL_ENV=modern npx babel --root-mode upward bin -d dist/modern --extensions '.js,.jsx' --source-maps --ignore '**/tests','**/stories' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.prepare: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --serial clean:all svg-optimize --parallel build:convert build:copy
